div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 648px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1047px; margin-left: 2px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
text-align: left

b.div: System Context diagram for a mission app running on Big Bang

div.style: text-align: left

div.div: High-level architecture of how a mission app runs on top of Big Bang. Assumes the system is using CNAP.

switch.text: System Context diagram for a mission app running on Big Bang...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 123px; margin-left: 100px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;

font.font:

running inside Big Bang
